text: التى لم يخلق مثلها فى البلد

translations.translation: The like of whom were never created in the realm;
the like of whom no nation was ever created in the lands of the world?
whose like has never been created in any other land.
Like whom no one else was born in the cities.
The like of which were not created in the land
The like of which were not created in the (other) cities;
the like of which was never created in the land,
The like of which was not created in the lands;
the like of which has never been created in the land,
The like of which was not built in the cities,
the like of which was not created among cities,
The like of which were not produced in (all) the land?
The like of which were not created in the land?
the like of which was never created in the countries?
The like of which was never created in the land.
The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
[89:8] the like of which was not created in the land, in terms of their power of assault and strength,

(The like of which was not created in the lands) the like of their strength and height were not created in the land; it is also said that Iram is the name of a town built by Shadid and Shaddad whose columns were of gold and silver and the like of its beauty was not created in the land;
